titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5652) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2013.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-472, by Mr. Woodall.

The resolution provides that an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 112-21 shall be considered as adopted. All points of order against provisions in the bill, as amended, are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 130.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 648.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 177 (Roll no. 244).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 183 (Roll no. 245).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/9/2012--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5652) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2013.
